Package com.dougnoel.sentinel.configurations

Class Configuration

java.lang.Object
com.dougnoel.sentinel.configurations.Configuration
public class Configuration extends Object
Manages configuration actions, changes, and interaction with PageObject including functionality to get default timeout, default time units, environment data, config path and package lists from PageObject, current URL or URL from a given pageName, user name or password from given account, env, or page, loads pageData for a given pageName, authentication with SSL, searching directories, and class getter and setter method.

  • Method Details

    • getOrCreateConfigurationData

      private static String getOrCreateConfigurationData(String configurationKey)
      Returns the configuration value for the given configuration property and the given environment from the ConfigurationData class.
      Parameters:
      configurationKey - String the key for the requested configuration property
      Returns:
      String the configuration value

    • toString

      public static String toString(String property)
      Returns the configuration for a given property as a String value. It has the following precedence for searching for a value:
      1. A value stored at runtime.
      2. A value set on the command line.
      3. A value set in the configuration file.
      The first time it is run, the value found will be stored for future calls. If no value is found, null is returned.
      Parameters:
      property - String the requested configuration property
      Returns:
      String the value of the requested configuration property (null if nothing is found)

    • toString

      public static String toString(String property, String defaultValue)
      Returns the configuration for a given property as a String value. It has the following precedence for searching for a value:
      1. A value stored at runtime.
      2. A value set on the command line.
      3. A value set in the configuration file.
      The first time it is run, the value found will be stored for future calls. If no value is found, the passed default value is returned.
      Parameters:
      property - String the requested configuration property
      defaultValue - String the default to return if no value is found
      Returns:
      String the value of the requested configuration property (null if nothing is found)

    • update

      public static void update(String property, String value)
      Updates a configuration value once runtime has started. This should never be used in a Cucumber runner as it will mask any values in the configuration file and on the command line.
      Parameters:
      property - String the property to update
      value - String the value to be used

    • clear

      public static void clear(String property)
      Clears a configuration value once runtime has started. This should never be used in a Cucumber runner as it will mask any values in the configuration file and on the command line.
      Parameters:
      property - String the property to clear

    • toDouble

      public static Double toDouble(String property)
      Returns the given configuration value stored in the passed property as a Double, or 0.0 if nothing is found.
      Parameters:
      property - String the requested configuration property key
      Returns:
      Double the requested value as a Double or 0.0 if nothing valid is found

    • toBoolean

      public static boolean toBoolean(String property)
      Returns the given configuration value stored in the passed property as a boolean, or false if nothing is found.
      Parameters:
      property - String the requested configuration property key
      Returns:
      boolean the requested value as a boolean or false if nothing valid is found

    • update

      Parameters:
      property - String the property to update
      value - Double the value to be used

      value - Long the value to be used

    • environment

      public static String environment()
      Returns the system environment. If no environment is set, a warning message is logged and a default value of "localhost" is set.
      Returns:
      String text of system env info

    • environment

      protected static void environment(String env)
      Setter intended only for unit testing. Sets the stored value and also the System Property.
      Parameters:
      env - String env to set, null to clear

    • findPageObjectFilePath

      public static File findPageObjectFilePath(String pageName)
      Returns the file path for a given page object.
      Parameters:
      pageName - String the name of the page object
      Returns:
      File the OS path to the config file

    • loadPageData

      private static PageData loadPageData(String pageName)
      Returns page data through yaml instructions to a config path in given pageName string.
      Parameters:
      pageName - String the name of the page for which the data is retrieved
      Returns:
      PageData the class for the data on desired page
      See Also:
      • findPageObjectFilePath(String)

    • getPageObjectType

      public static PageObjectType getPageObjectType(String pageName)
      Returns the type of page object. Most will be WEBPAGE, but if an "executables:" section is defined instead of a "urls:" section, this will return EXECUTABLE as the type. If we do not know what the current type is, we infer it by using the current type set in the PageManager.
      Parameters:
      pageName - String the name of the page for which the data is retrieved
      Returns:
      PageObjectType the type of page object either WEBPAGE or EXECUTABLE

    • url

      public static String url()
      Returns the URL for the currently active page based on the environment value set.
      Returns:
      String the desired URL
      See Also:
      • PageManager.getPage()
      • Page.getName()

    • url

      protected static String url(String pageName)
      Returns a URL for the given page name based on the environment value set.
      Parameters:
      pageName - String the name of the page from which the url is retrieved
      Returns:
      String the url for the given page and current environment

    • executable

      public static String executable()
      Returns the Executable for the currently active page based on the environment value set.
      Returns:
      String the desired application executable path

    • executable

      protected static String executable(String pageName)
      Returns an Executable path for the given page name based on the environment value set.
      Parameters:
      pageName - String the name of the page from which the executable is retrieved
      Returns:
      String the executable path for the given page and current environment

    • accountInformation

      public static String accountInformation(String account, String key)
      Returns username or password. Parent Method. Creates pageData object and gets user name or password from its account and env. Logs the key from account info. and logs data var before returning.
      Parameters:
      account - String user account
      key - String username or password
      Returns:
      String requested username or password

    • getElement

      public static Map<String,String> getElement(String elementName, String pageName)

    • getTestdataValue

      public static String getTestdataValue(String testdataObjectName, String testdataObjectKey)
      Gets the value of the given key of the given testdata object in the current environment. Defaults to "default" if environment is not set.

      Example of testdata:

       testdata:
   default:
     report:
       id: 09876
       version: 9
   alpha:
     report:
       id: 123456
       version: 1

      To retrieve the version of report, call getTestdataValue("report", "version")

      Parameters:
      testdataObjectName - String name of the testdata object
      testdataObjectKey - String name of the property of the given testdata object
      Returns:
      String the value of the given key in the given object

    • getPageParts

      public static String[] getPageParts(String pageName)

    • configurationNotFoundErrorMessage

      private static String configurationNotFoundErrorMessage(String configurtaionValue)

    • browser

      public static String browser()
      Returns a sanitized version of the browser set in the config file or on the command line.
      Returns:
      String a sanitized string containing the browser

    • operatingSystem

      public static String operatingSystem()
      Returns a sanitized version of the operating system set in the config file or on the command line.
      Returns:
      String a sanitized string containing the operating system

    • detectOperatingSystem

      protected static String detectOperatingSystem()
      Returns the simple operating system of windows, mac or linux. Returns the full os name if none of those are matched.
      Returns:
      String operating system
